{"id":869482457,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1672638448,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/869482457/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Detect Capital","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool detectCapitalUse(string word) {\n        int low=0 , up=0;\n        int flag=1;\n        if(word.length()==1) return flag;\n        int first=int(word[0]);\n        int second=word[1];\n        if(first>90 and second>90)  low=1;\n        else if(first<=90 and second>90)  low=1;\n        else if(first<=90 and second<=90) up=1;\n        else  {\n            flag=0;\n            return flag;\n        }\n        for(int i=2;i<word.length();i++){\n            if((low and word[i]<=90) or (up and word[i]>90)){\n                flag=0;\n                break;\n            } \n        }\n        return flag;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"detect-capital","has_notes":false}
